results.name: Decimal expansion of 1/9801.
comment: Group the terms 2 by 2 to get (except 98): 00, 01, 02, 03, ..., 97, 99, then repeat. - _Michel Marcus_, Mar 17 2013
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
StackExchange, What is special about the numbers 9801, 998001, 99980001 ..?
results.author: _Marvin Ray Burns_
